title: Forge + Bond F+B 25 GR review: Comfortable carbon wheels made to be recyclable
content:
The new Utah-based company builds a gravel wheelset that promises superior ride smoothness, stout construction, and recyclability.

Read the full article at Forge + Bond F+B 25 GR review: Comfortable carbon wheels made to be recyclable on Velo.
author: CyclingTips
